articles.description: A four on the final ball of the match in Napier handed New Zealand a four-wicket victory to set up a series decider in Auckland later in the week
articles.content: New Zealand overcame a late batting collapse and captain Sophie Devines illness to upset world champions Australia with a four-wicket victory in the second Twenty20 womens cricket international at Na… [+2064 chars]
